@tocomplete.description: indicates something needs to be finished or accomplished

@request.description: indicates something needs to be finished or accomplished

@complaint.description: indicates something needs to be finished or accomplished

subject: subject

@subject.description: a particular branch of study, such as mathematics, art, science, etc.

@mathematics.description: the study of numbers, quantities, shapes, and patterns

@art.description: creative expression through various mediums such as painting, sculpture, etc.

@science.description: the systematic study of the structure and behavior of the physical and natural world

@geography.description: the study of the earth's landscapes, environments, and inhabitants

@history.description: the study of past events, particularly in human affairs

@computer.description: a programmable electronic device that processes data and performs tasks according to instructions

@socialstudies.description: the study of human societies and their interactions

@hey.description: informal greeting or getting someone's attention

findcourse: find a course you want to learn

@findcourse.description: prompt to search for a desired course or subject to study

@search.description: action to find or look up something specific

@category.description: a grouping or classification of items based on shared characteristics

@seeall.description: action to view all items or content within a category or list

@hi.description: informal greeting or getting someone's attention

@fortotalcourse.description: indicates action related to the entire course or curriculum

@addnewsub.description: action to include a new subscription or subject

@upcomingsubjectpayment.description: notification or reminder about forthcoming payment for a subject

@subscriptions.description: services or subjects for which one has paid or agreed to pay regularly

@price.description: amount of money expected or required for payment

@month.description: a unit of time, approximately equal to the period of the moon's revolution around the earth

@individual.description: relating to one single person or thing

@cancelsubscription.description: action to terminate or end a subscription service

@messages.description: communication or correspondence between individuals or groups

@accountsettings.description: customization options related to one's account

@editprofile.description: action to modify or update personal information

@changepassword.description: action to alter or set a new password

@addlocation.description: action to include or update a geographical position

@pushnotification.description: a message or alert delivered to a device or application

@darkmode.description: display setting that reduces light emission for use in low-light environments

@aboutus.description: information regarding the organization or individuals behind the product or service

@privacyconcern.description: issues or worries regarding the protection of personal information

@logout.description: action to end a session or sign out

@welcome.description: greeting to newcomers or users entering a platform

@suggestedyou.description: courses recommended based on user preferences or history

@topics.description: subjects or themes of discussion or study

@lession.description: a unit of teaching or learning

@min.description: unit of time equal to sixty seconds

@entroll now.description: action to register or sign up for a course

@chat.description: action to engage in real-time conversation with other users

@students.description: action to view or manage student profiles

@here is your status.description: action to view your current status or progress

@statistics.description: action to view statistical data or analysis

@realtimeprogress.description: action to view progress in real-time

@lesson.description: action to view or manage lesson content

@keep processing.description: action to continue processing or handling data or tasks

@addlesson.description: action to add a new lesson to a course or curriculum

@cancel.description: action to cancel or terminate an ongoing process

@update.description: action to modify or change existing data or information

@save.description: action to save changes or data

title: title

@title.description: action to set or modify the title of a document, course, or item

@cover image.description: action to set or modify the cover image of a document, course, or item

@add.description: action to add or include something

@apply as a teacher.description: action to submit an application to become a teacher or instructor

@more.description: action to view additional options or information
